register.doc: x- hp filter output.
register.name: XHP_L

register.doc: y- hp filter output
register.name: YHP_L

register.doc: z- hpfilteroutput
register.name: ZHP_L

register.doc: output register x
register.name: XOUT_L

register.doc: output register y
register.name: YOUT_L

register.doc: output register z
register.name: ZOUT_L

register.doc: communication selftest
register.name: COTR

field.doc: test value
field.name: DCSTR

register.doc: This register can be used for supplier recognition
register.name: WHO_AM_I

field.doc: WHO_AM_I -value
field.name: WIA

register.doc: Current Tilt Position Register.
register.name: TSCP

register.doc: Previous Tilt Positon Register.
register.name: TSPP

register.doc: This register indicates the triggering axis when a tap/double tap interrupt occurs
register.name: INS1

register.doc: This register tells witch function caused an interrupt.
register.name: INS2

field.doc: indicates buffer full interrupt. Automatically cleared when buffer is read.
field.name: BFI

field.doc: Watermark interrupt, bit is set to one when FIFO has filled up to the value stored in the sample bits.This bit is automatically cleared when FIFO/FILO is read and the content returns to a value below the value stored in the sample bits.
field.name: WMI

field.doc: indicates that new acceleration data (0x06h to 0x0Bh) is available. This bit is cleared when acceleration data is read or the interrupt release register INT_REL is read.
field.name: DRDY

field.doc: status of tap/double tap, bit is released when interrupt release register INT_REL is read.
field.name: TDTS

field.doc: Status of Wake up. This bit is cleared when the interrupt release register INT_REL is read.
field.name: WUFS

field.doc: Tilt Position status. This bit is cleared when the interrupt release register INT_REL is read.
field.name: TPS

register.doc: This register reports the axis and direction of detected motion.
register.name: INS3

register.doc: This register reports the status of the interrupt.
register.name: STATUS_REG

field.doc: INT reports the combined (OR) interrupt information of all features.
field.name: INT

register.doc: Latched interrupt source information (INS1,INS2, INS3 except WMI/BFI and INT when WMI/BFI is zero) is cleared and physical interrupt latched pin is changed to itâ€™s inactive state when this register is read. Read value is dummy.
register.name: INT_REL

register.doc: Read/write control register that controls the main feature set.
register.name: CNTL1

field.doc: controls the operating mode of the KX022.
field.name: PC1

field.doc: determines the performance mode of the KX022. The noise varies with ODR, RES and different LP_CNTL settings possibly reducing the effective resolution.
field.name: RES

field.doc: enables the reporting of the availability of new acceleration data as an interrupt
field.name: DRDYE

field.doc: selects the acceleration range of the accelerometer outputs
field.name: GSEL

field.doc: enables the Directional Tap function that will detect single and double tap events.
field.name: TDTE

field.doc: enables the Wake Up (motion detect) function
field.name: WUFE

field.doc: enables the Tilt Position function that will detect changes in device orientation.
field.name: TPE

register.doc: Read/write control register that provides more feature set control.
register.name: CNTL2

field.doc: initiates software reset, which performs the RAM reboot routine
field.name: SRST

field.doc: command test control
field.name: COTC

register.doc: Read/write control register that provides more feature set control.
register.name: CNTL3

field.doc: sets the output data rate for the Tilt Position function
field.name: OTP

field.doc: sets the output data rate for the Directional TapTM function
field.name: OTDT

field.doc: sets the output data rate for the general motion detection function and the high-pass filtered outputs
field.name: OWUF

register.doc: This register is responsible for configuring ODR (output data rate) and filter settings
register.name: ODCNTL

field.doc: filter bypass mode
field.name: IIR_BYPASS

field.doc: low-pass filter roll off control
field.name: LPRO

item.doc: filter corner frequency set to ODR/9
item.name: ODR_9

item.doc: filter corner frequency set to ODR/2
item.name: ODR_2

field.doc: acceleration output data rate.
field.name: OSA

register.doc: This register controls the settings for the physical interrupt pin INT1
register.name: INC1

field.doc: enables/disables the physical interrupt
field.name: IEN1

field.doc: sets the polarity of the physical interrupt pin
field.name: IEA1

field.doc: sets the response of the physical interrupt pin
field.name: IEL1

field.doc: sets the polarity of Self Test
field.name: STPOL

field.doc: sets the 3-wire SPI interface
field.name: SPI3E

register.doc: This register controls which axis and direction of detected motion can cause an interrupt.
register.name: INC2

field.doc: x negative (x-): 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled
field.name: XNWUE

field.doc: x positive (x+): 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled
field.name: XPWUE

field.doc: y negative (y-): 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled
field.name: YNWUE

field.doc: y positive (y+): 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled
field.name: YPWUE

field.doc: z negative (z-): 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled
field.name: ZNWUE

field.doc: z positive (z+): 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled
field.name: ZPWUE

register.doc: This register controls which axis and direction of tap/double tap can cause an interrupt.
register.name: INC3

field.doc: x negative (x-): 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled
field.name: TLEM

field.doc: x positive (x+): 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled
field.name: TRIM

field.doc: y negative (y-): 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled
field.name: TDOM

field.doc: y positive (y+): 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled
field.name: TUPM

field.doc: z negative (z-): 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled
field.name: TFDM

field.doc: z positive (z+): 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled
field.name: TFUM

register.doc: This register controls routing of an interrupt reporting to physical interrupt pin INT1
register.name: INC4

field.doc: Buffer full interrupt reported on physical interrupt pin INT1
field.name: BFI1

field.doc: Watermark interrupt reported on physical interrupt pin INT1
field.name: WMI1

field.doc: Data ready interrupt reported on physical interrupt pin INT1
field.name: DRDYI1

field.doc: Tap/Double Tap interrupt reported on physical interrupt pin INT1
field.name: TDTI1

field.doc: Wake-Up (motion detect) interrupt reported on physical interrupt pin INT1
field.name: WUFI1

field.doc: Tilt position interrupt reported on physical interrupt pin INT1
field.name: TPI1

register.doc: This register controls the settings for the physical interrupt pin INT2.
register.name: INC5

field.doc: enables/disables the physical interrupt
field.name: IEN2

field.doc: sets the polarity of the physical interrupt pin
field.name: IEA2

field.doc: sets the response of the physical interrupt pin
field.name: IEL2

register.doc: This register controls routing of interrupt reporting to physical interrupt pin INT2
register.name: INC6

field.doc: BFI2 â€“ Buffer full interrupt reported on physical interrupt pin INT2
field.name: BFI2

field.doc: WMI2 - Watermark interrupt reported on physical interrupt pin INT2
field.name: WMI2

field.doc: DRDYI2 â€“ Data ready interrupt reported on physical interrupt pin INT2
field.name: DRDYI2

field.doc: TDTI2 - Tap/Double Tap interrupt reported on physical interrupt pin INT2
field.name: TDTI2

field.doc: WUFI2 â€“ Wake-Up (motion detect) interrupt reported on physical interrupt pin INT2
field.name: WUFI2

field.doc: TPI2 â€“ Tilt position interrupt reported on physical interrupt pin INT2
field.name: TPI2

field.doc: This register is the initial count register for the tilt position state timer
field.name: TSC

field.doc: This register is the initial count register for the motion detection timer
field.name: WUFC

register.doc: This register is responsible for enableing/disabling reporting of Tap/Double Tap.
register.name: TDTRC

field.doc: enables/disables the double tap interrupt
field.name: DTRE

field.doc: enables/disables single tap interrupt
field.name: STRE

field.doc: This register contains counter information for the detection of a double tap event.
field.name: TDTC

field.doc: This register represents the 8-bit jerk high threshold to determine if a tap is detected.
field.name: TTH

field.doc: This register represents the 8-bit (0dâ€“ 255d) jerk low threshold to determine if a tap is detected.
field.name: TTL

register.doc: This register contains counter information for the detection of any tap event.
register.name: FTD

field.doc: High part of FTD
field.name: FTDH

field.doc: Low part of FTD
field.name: FTDL

field.doc: This register contains counter information for the detection of a double tap event
field.name: STD

field.doc: This register contains counter information for the detection of a tap event.
field.name: TLT

field.doc: This register contains counter information for the detection of single and double taps.
field.name: TWS

field.doc: This register sets the threshold for wake-up (motion detect) interrupt is set.
field.name: ATH

field.doc: This register sets the low level threshold for tilt angle detection.
field.name: TA

field.doc: This register sets the high level threshold for tilt angle detection.
field.name: HL

register.doc: This register sets the Hysteresis that is placed in between the Screen Rotation states
register.name: HYST_SET

field.doc: This register sets the Hysteresis that is placed in between the Screen Rotation states
field.name: RES

field.doc: This register sets the Hysteresis that is placed in between the Screen Rotation states
field.name: HYST

register.doc: Low Power Control sets the number of samples of accelerometer output to be average
register.name: LP_CNTL

field.doc: Averaging Filter Control
field.name: AVC

register.doc: Read/write control register that controls the buffer sample threshold
register.name: BUF_CNTL1

field.doc: buffer sample control threshold
field.name: SMP_TH0_6

register.doc: Read/write control register that controls sample buffer operation
register.name: BUF_CNTL2

field.doc: controls activation of the sample buffer
field.name: BUFE

field.doc: determines the resolution of the acceleration data samples collected by the sample
field.name: BRES

field.doc: buffer full interrupt enable bit
field.name: BFIE

field.doc: selects the operating mode of the sample buffer
field.name: BUF_M

item.doc: The buffer collects 681 sets of 8-bit low resolution values or 339 sets of 16-bit high resolution values and then stops collecting data, collecting new data only when the buffer is not full
item.name: FIFO

item.doc: The buffer holds the last 681 sets of 8-bit low resolution values or 339 sets of 16-bit high resolution values. Once the buffer is full, the oldest data is discarded to make room for newer data.
item.name: STREAM

item.doc: When a trigger event occurs, the buffer holds the last data set of SMP[9:0] samples before the trigger event and then continues to collect data until full. New data is collected only when the buffer is not full.
item.name: TRIGGER

item.doc: The buffer holds the last 681 sets of 8-bit low resolution values or 339 sets of 16-bit high resolution values. Once the buffer is full, the oldest data is discarded to make room for newer data. Reading from the buffer in this mode will return the most recent data first.
item.name: FILO

register.doc: This register reports the status of the sample buffer
register.name: BUF_STATUS_1

field.doc: buffer status sample level
field.name: SMP_LEV0_7

register.doc: This register reports the status of the sample buffer trigger function
register.name: BUF_STATUS_2

field.doc: reports the status of the bufferâ€™s trigger function if this mode has been selected
field.name: BUF_TRIG

field.doc: Latched buffer status information and the entire sample buffer are cleared when any data is written to this register.
Buffer output register

register.doc: When 0xCA is written to this register, the MEMS self-test function is enabled. Electrostatic-actuation of the accelerometer, results in a DC shift of the X, Y and Z axis outputs. Writing 0x00 to this register will return the accelerometer to normal operation
register.name: SELF_TEST

field.doc: Self test value
field.name: MEMS_TEST

register.doc: This register can be used for supplier recognition
register.name: WHO_AM_I

register.doc: This register can be used for supplier recognition
register.name: WHO_AM_I
